attributes.action: Reduce the number of petitions currently circulating!
attributes.background: The rise of social media has brought with it a vast increase in the number of petitions. Whilst most of them campaign for worthy causes, many of them are simply exercises in time wasting. I wish to present this issue to the house of commons to see if there is anything they can do to help.

rejection.details: You may wish to submit a further petition setting out which specific measures you would like to see taken in order to address this issue.
